computer.colors: 2 for monochrome versions (MP-1601S,1602S,1622), 8 for colour versions (MP-1605S,MP-1625)
computer.coprocessor: Socket for an optional 8087 math coprocessor
computer.description:
Multi16 was Japanese first 16-bit personal computer. This machine is known as first Shift-JIS code machine.
Shift-JIS code is Chineese character's code defined by Microsoft. It met great success and became Japanese standard.
Multi-16 could be equipped with an optional hard disk unit. It was only 10 MBytes and costed over $4,000!
Thanks to Nomura Hisayuki for this information
computer.keyboard: Full stroke 95 keys with 10 function keys and numeric keypad
computer.name: Multi 16
computer.peripherals: 6 expansion slots (5 available. 1 used for the FDD controler), RS232 and GPIB cards
computer.ram: 128 KB (MP-1601S) or 256 KB (MP-1625) up to 576 KB
computer.text: 80 x 25 or 80 x 20 for ASCII characters. 40 x 25 or 40 x 20 for Chineese characters
